uk.ac.gla.abbi.abbi_library.utilities

Class UtilityFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.gla.abbi.abbi_library.utilities.UtilityFunctions

  • public class UtilityFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility functions that are used to implement the demo Android application ABBI Remote. These are scaling/ normalization functions and conversion functions.

    Created by Peter Yordanov on 9.7.2015 ã..

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int changeRangeMaintainingRatio(int currentValue, int oldMin, int oldMax, int newMin, int newMax)
      This function is used to change the range of the frequency and volume when scaling the values during UI <-> bracelet communication

      - ( 0-65534 /bracelet/ <-> 0-15 /UI/ ) for sound volume - ( 500-4000 Hz /bracelet/ <-> 0-35 /UI/ ) for sound frequency/ pitch - ( 10-240 /bracelet/ <-> 0-23 /UI/ ) for beats per minute (bpm)
      static int frequencyToPitch(int f, int samplingRate)
      Frequency to pitch conversion function
      static java.lang.String lookUpFileNameBasedOnIndex(int index, java.lang.String[] array)
      A very simple function to retrieve a sound filename based on an input index
      static int pitchToFrequency(int p, int samplingRate)
      Pitch to frequency conversion function

    • Method Detail

      • changeRangeMaintainingRatio

        public static int changeRangeMaintainingRatio(int currentValue,
                              int oldMin,
                              int oldMax,
                              int newMin,
                              int newMax)
        This function is used to change the range of the frequency and volume when scaling the values during UI <-> bracelet communication

        - ( 0-65534 /bracelet/ <-> 0-15 /UI/ ) for sound volume - ( 500-4000 Hz /bracelet/ <-> 0-35 /UI/ ) for sound frequency/ pitch - ( 10-240 /bracelet/ <-> 0-23 /UI/ ) for beats per minute (bpm)

        Parameters:
        currentValue - this parameter represents the current value that needs to be scaled
        oldMin - represents the minimum possible value of the current parameter range
        oldMax - represents the maximum possible value of the current parameter range
        newMin - represents the minimum possible value of the new range for the variable
        newMax - represents the maximum possible value of the new range for the variable
        Returns:
        the new, scaled value

      • pitchToFrequency

        public static int pitchToFrequency(int p,
                   int samplingRate)
        Pitch to frequency conversion function
        Parameters:
        p - this is the current pitch
        samplingRate - current sampling rate
        Returns:
        the equivalent frequency

      • frequencyToPitch

        public static int frequencyToPitch(int f,
                   int samplingRate)
        Frequency to pitch conversion function
        Parameters:
        f - the current frequency
        samplingRate - the current sampling rate
        Returns:
        the equivalent pitch

      • lookUpFileNameBasedOnIndex

        public static java.lang.String lookUpFileNameBasedOnIndex(int index,
                                          java.lang.String[] array)
        A very simple function to retrieve a sound filename based on an input index
        Parameters:
        index - input index parameter, a query id
        array - a String[] array to be used to return an element
        Returns:
